targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("usage_iowait"), 1s) FROM "cpu" WHERE "host" =~ /^$server$/ AND "cpu" = 'cpu-total' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean(temp_c) as "Temperature" FROM "smart_device" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ AND "device" =~ /$disk$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), device,model,serial_no fill(previous)
SELECT last("health_ok") AS Health, last(temp_c) as "Temperature" FROM "smart_device" WHERE ("device" =~ /^$disk$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "device","model" ,"serial_no"
SELECT last("raw_value") AS CommandTimeouts FROM "smart_attribute" WHERE ("device" =~ /^$disk$/ AND "host" =~ /^$server$/ AND "name" = 'Command_Timeout') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "device" fill(null)

SELECT last("raw_value") AS CurrentPendingSectors FROM "smart_attribute" WHERE ("device" =~ /^$disk$/ AND "host" =~ /^$server$/ AND "name" = 'Current_Pending_Sector') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "device" fill(null)

SELECT * FROM
(SELECT last("raw_value") * 512 * 1024 AS BytesRead FROM "smart_attribute" 
WHERE ("device" =~ /^$disk$/ 
AND "host" =~ /^$server$/ 
AND "name" = 'Data_Units_Read') 
AND $timeFilter 
),
(SELECT last("raw_value") * 512 AS BytesRead FROM "smart_attribute" 
WHERE ("device" =~ /^$disk$/ 
AND "host" =~ /^$server$/ 
AND "name" = 'Total_LBAs_Read') 
AND $timeFilter 
),
(SELECT last("raw_value") * 1024 * 1024 * 1024 AS BytesRead FROM "smart_attribute" 
WHERE ("device" =~ /^$disk$/ 
AND "host" =~ /^$server$/ 
AND "name" = 'Host_Reads_GiB') 
AND $timeFilter
)
GROUP BY "device" fill(null)

SELECT * FROM
(SELECT last("raw_value") * 512 * 1024 AS BytesWritten FROM "smart_attribute" 
WHERE ("device" =~ /^$disk$/ 
AND "host" =~ /^$server$/ 
AND "name" = 'Data_Units_Written') 
AND $timeFilter 
),
(SELECT last("raw_value") * 512 AS BytesWritten FROM "smart_attribute" 
WHERE ("device" =~ /^$disk$/ 
AND "host" =~ /^$server$/ 
AND "name" = 'Total_LBAs_Written') 
AND $timeFilter 
),
(SELECT last("raw_value") * 1024 * 1024 * 1024 AS BytesWritten FROM "smart_attribute" 
WHERE ("device" =~ /^$disk$/ 
AND "host" =~ /^$server$/ 
AND "name" = 'Host_Writes_GiB') 
AND $timeFilter
)
GROUP BY "device" fill(null)

SELECT last("raw_value") AS OfflineUncorrectables FROM "smart_attribute" WHERE ("device" =~ /^$disk$/ AND "host" =~ /^$server$/ AND "name" = 'Offline_Uncorrectable') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "device" fill(null)
SELECT last("raw_value") AS PowerOnHours FROM "smart_attribute" WHERE ("device" =~ /^$disk$/ AND "host" =~ /^$server$/ AND "name" = 'Power_On_Hours') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "device" fill(null)

SELECT last("raw_value") AS ReallocatedEvents FROM "smart_attribute" WHERE ("device" =~ /^$disk$/ AND "host" =~ /^$server$/ AND "name" = 'Reallocated_Event_Count') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "device" fill(null)

SELECT last("raw_value") AS ReallocatedSectors FROM "smart_attribute" WHERE ("device" =~ /^$disk$/ AND "host" =~ /^$server$/ AND "name" = 'Reallocated_Sector_Ct') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "device" fill(null)
SELECT last("raw_value") AS SpinRetrys FROM "smart_attribute" WHERE ("device" =~ /^$disk$/ AND "host" =~ /^$server$/ AND "name" = 'Spin_Retry_Count') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "device" fill(null)

SELECT * FROM
(SELECT 100 - last("raw_value") AS Health FROM "smart_attribute" 
WHERE ("device" =~ /^$disk$/ 
AND "host" =~ /^$server$/ 
AND "name" = 'Percentage_Used') 
AND $timeFilter 
),
(SELECT 100 - last("raw_value") AS Health FROM "smart_attribute" 
WHERE ("device" =~ /^$disk$/ 
AND "host" =~ /^$server$/ 
AND "name" = 'Media_Wearout_Indicator') 
AND $timeFilter 
),
(SELECT last("value") AS Health FROM "smart_attribute" 
WHERE ("device" =~ /^$disk$/ 
AND "host" =~ /^$server$/ 
AND "name" = 'Wear_Leveling_Count') 
AND $timeFilter 
),
(SELECT last("value") AS Health FROM "smart_attribute" 
WHERE ("device" =~ /^$disk$/ 
AND "host" =~ /^$server$/ 
AND "name" = 'Percent_Lifetime_Remain') 
AND $timeFilter 
)
GROUP BY "device" fill(null)

SELECT mean(usage_user) as "user", mean(usage_system) as "system", mean(usage_softirq) as "softirq", mean(usage_steal) as "steal", mean(usage_nice) as "nice", mean(usage_irq) as "irq", mean(usage_iowait) as "iowait", mean(usage_guest) as "guest", mean(usage_guest_nice) as "guest_nice"  FROM "cpu" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ and cpu = 'cpu-total' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT mean(load1) as short,mean(load5) as medium,mean(load15) as long FROM "system" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * ORDER BY asc

SELECT mean(running) as running, mean(blocked) as blocked, mean(sleeping) as sleeping, mean(stopped) as stopped, mean(zombies) as zombies, mean(paging) as paging, mean(unknown) as unknown FROM "processes" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host ORDER BY asc
SELECT mean(fan_input) as "Fan Speed" FROM "sensors" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), feature fill(previous)

SELECT mean(total) as total, mean(used) as used, mean(cached) as cached, mean(free) as free, mean(buffered) as buffered  FROM "mem" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host ORDER BY asc
SELECT distinct("memory_total") FROM "nvidia_smi" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/ AND "name" =~ /^$GPU$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT distinct("memory_used") FROM "nvidia_smi" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/ AND "name" =~ /^$GPU$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT distinct("temperature_gpu") FROM "nvidia_smi" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/ AND "name" =~ /^$GPU$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(context_switches),1s)as "context switches"  FROM "kernel" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host ORDER BY asc
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(processes_forked),1s) as forks FROM "kernel" WHERE "host" =~ /^$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host fill(null)
SELECT mean("file-max") as max FROM "linux_sysctl_fs" WHERE "host" =~ /^$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host fill(null)
SELECT mean("file-nr") as opened FROM "linux_sysctl_fs" WHERE "host" =~ /^$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host fill(null)

SELECT mean(usage_user) as "user", mean(usage_system) as "system", mean(usage_softirq) as "softirq", mean(usage_steal) as "steal", mean(usage_nice) as "nice", mean(usage_irq) as "irq", mean(usage_iowait) as "iowait", mean(usage_guest) as "guest", mean(usage_guest_nice) as "guest_nice"  FROM "cpu" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ and cpu = '$cpu' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *

SELECT mean(tcp_close) as CLOSED, mean(tcp_close_wait) as CLOSE_WAIT, mean(tcp_closing) as CLOSING, mean(tcp_established) as ESTABLISHED, mean(tcp_fin_wait1) as FIN_WAIT1, mean(tcp_fin_wait2) as FIN_WAIT2, mean(tcp_last_ack) as LAST_ACK, mean(tcp_syn_recv) as SYN_RECV, mean(tcp_syn_sent) as SYN_SENT, mean(tcp_time_wait) as TIME_WAIT FROM "netstat" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host ORDER BY asc
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(bytes_recv),1s)*8 as "in"  FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /$server/ AND interface =~ /$netif/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(bytes_sent),1s)*8 as "out" FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /$server/ AND interface =~ /$netif/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(packets_recv), 1s) as "in" FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /$server/ AND interface =~ /$netif/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(packets_sent), 1s) as "out" FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /$server/ AND interface =~ /$netif/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(drop_in), 1s) as "in" FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /$server/ AND interface =~ /$netif/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host,interface fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(drop_out), 1s) as "out" FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /$server/ AND interface =~ /$netif/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host,interface fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(err_in), 1s) as "in" FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /$server/ AND interface =~ /$netif/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host,interface fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(err_out), 1s) as "out" FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /$server/ AND interface =~ /$netif/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host,interface fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("in")) as "in", non_negative_derivative(mean("out")) as "out" FROM "swap" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host ORDER BY asc
SELECT mean(used) as "used", mean(total) as "total" FROM "swap" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host ORDER BY asc
SELECT mean("arcstats_size") AS "size" FROM "zfs" WHERE ("host" =~ /$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("arcstats_metadata_size") AS "Metadata", mean("arcstats_mfu_size") AS "MFU", mean("arcstats_mru_size") AS "MRU" FROM "zfs" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

SELECT (mean(arcstats_hits) / (mean(arcstats_hits) + mean(arcstats_misses))) * 100 AS "ARC Hit Rate" 
FROM "zfs" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

SELECT (sum(arcstats_l2_hits) / (sum(arcstats_l2_hits) + sum(arcstats_l2_misses))) * 100 AS "L2ARC Hit Rate" 
FROM "zfs" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("arcstats_hits"),1s) AS "ARC Hits" FROM "zfs" WHERE ("host" =~ /$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("arcstats_misses"),1s) AS "ARC Misses" FROM "zfs" WHERE ("host" =~ /$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * fill(none)
SELECT mean("arcstats_l2_size") AS "size" FROM "zfs" WHERE ("host" =~ /$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("arcstats_l2_hdr_size") AS "L2ARC Metadata" FROM "zfs" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

SELECT 
non_negative_derivative(mean(arcstats_l2_read_bytes),1s) AS "L2ARC Read Bytes",
non_negative_derivative(mean(arcstats_l2_write_bytes),1s) AS "L2ARC Write Bytes"
 FROM "zfs" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("arcstats_l2_hits"),1s) AS "L2ARC Hits" FROM "zfs" WHERE ("host" =~ /$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("arcstats_l2_misses"),1s) AS "L2ARC Misses" FROM "zfs" WHERE ("host" =~ /$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(reads),1s) as "read" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ AND "name" =~ /$disk$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(writes),1s) as "write" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ AND "name" =~ /$disk$/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(read_bytes),1s) as "read" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ AND "name" =~ /$disk$/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(write_bytes),1s) as "write" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ AND "name" =~ /$disk$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(read_time),1s) as "read" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ AND "name" =~ /$disk$/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(write_time),1s) as "write" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ AND "name" =~ /$disk$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT mean(total) AS "total", mean(used) as "used" FROM "disk" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ AND "path" =~ /^$mountpoint$/AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host", "path"
SELECT mean(inodes_used) as "used" FROM "disk" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/  AND "path" =~ /^$mountpoint$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host", "path"
SELECT mean(inodes_free) + mean(inodes_used) as "total" FROM "disk" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/  AND "path" =~ /^$mountpoint$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host", "path"

list.label: Server
list.name: server
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM system WITH KEY=host

list.label: Mountpoint
list.name: mountpoint
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "disk" WITH KEY = "path" WHERE host =~ /$server/

list.label: CPU
list.name: cpu
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "cpu" WITH KEY = "cpu" WHERE host =~ /$server/

list.label: Disk
list.name: disk
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "diskio" WITH KEY = "name" WHERE host =~ /$server/

list.label: Network interface
list.name: netif
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "net" WITH KEY = "interface" WHERE host =~ /$server/

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "nvidia_smi" WITH KEY = "name" WHERE host =~ /$server/
list.name: GPU
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "nvidia_smi" WITH KEY = "name" WHERE host =~ /$server/
